review: Ladies, don't be discouraged by the reviews you read, which are so misleading - this shirt is not exclusively for men. I feel so alive when I wear this shirt! It it really brings out the beige in my teeth and further accentuates my frizzy blonde mullet. This is the first t-shirt I've found that actually doubles as home decor. When I'm not wearing this piece of art, I hang in on my livingroom wall, right next to my dream catcher. It goes great with my wood paneling. It's multi-functional and worth every penny!
productTitle: The Mountain Men's Three Wolf Moon Short Sleeve Tee
